thread.title: Clare Sabine

author: Clare Sabine
title: Clare Sabine
text:
Tyres on the drive delivered an excellent and convenient service. They called half an hour before to inform me of their arrival time and it was well worth paying the minimal extra fee to have a 2 hour time slot.
A very easy booking system with a prompt phone call to confirm timings.
The price of the tyres was comparable to the major brands as I researched this before booking.
Thank you Sanam for a professional and quick installation.
